item.title: Can someone help me fix account limits
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

Change
$result = $db->query(“SELECT owner FROM .$db->prefix.'rscd_players WHERE owner = '”.$pun_user[‘id’]."’");
to
$result = $db->query(“SELECT * FROM .$db->prefix.'rscd_players WHERE owner = '”.$pun_user[‘id’]."’");

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me fix account limits

item.title: Can someone help me fix account limits
item.dc:creator: @Ice_Storm Ice Storm
item.description:
@Ice_Storm wrote:

does anyone have any ideas how i can make a account register limit on rscd im using this code but still seems to let ppl create unlimited accounts.

$result = $db->query("SELECT `owner` FROM .$db->prefix.'rscd_players WHERE `owner` = '".$pun_user['id']."'"); if($db->num_rows($result) > 1) { $errors[] = 'You have already created too many accounts, limit reached.'; $errnum += 1; }

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me fix account limits
